presentationColumns.name: Staged Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of Staged Quantity for all the Shipment Lines where Line Status is equal to Staged.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.Staged Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Shipped Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of Shipped quantity for all the Shipment Lines where Line Status is equal to Interfaced and Shipped.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.Shipped Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Shipped Early Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of Shipped Quantity for all the Shipment Lines where Actual Ship Date is less than Scheduled Ship Date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.Shipped Early Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Shipped Late Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of Shipped Quantity for all the Shipment Lines where Actual Ship Date is greater than Scheduled Ship Date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.Shipped Late Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Back Ordered Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of Requested Quantity for all the Shipment Lines where Line Status is equal to Backordered.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.Back Ordered Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Cancelled Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of Canceled Quantity.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.Cancelled Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Release to Ship Cycle Days
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Actual Ship Date minus Movement Request Creation Date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.Release to Ship Cycle Days

presentationColumns.name: Lines Assigned to Shipment
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of Shipment lines associated with a Shipment.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.Lines Assigned to Shipment

presentationColumns.name: Orders Picked Not Shipped
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of all the Orders where the Shipment Line status is equal to Staged (Even if one Shipment Line in a Order is in Staged status).
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.Orders Picked Not Shipped

presentationColumns.name: Shipment Lines Picked Not Shipped
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of Shipment Lines where the Shipment Line status is equal to Staged.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.Shipment Lines Picked Not Shipped

presentationColumns.name: Volume
presentationColumns.description: This metric is shows Volume of the Shipment.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.Volume

presentationColumns.name: Gross Weight
presentationColumns.description: This metric is shows Gross Weight of the Shipment.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.Gross Weight

presentationColumns.name: Net Weight
presentationColumns.description: This metric is shows Net Weight of the Shipment.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.Net Weight

presentationColumns.name: Closed Shipments
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of Shipment Lines with Line Status is equal to Interfaced and Shipped.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.Closed Shipments

presentationColumns.name: Open Shipments
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of Shipment Lines with Line Status is equal to Not Shipped.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.Open Shipments

presentationColumns.name: Number of Shipments Ready-to-Ship
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of Shipment Lines with Line Status is equal to Staged and Shipment Number is not NULL.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.Number of Shipments Ready-to-Ship

presentationColumns.name: On Time Shipments
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of Shipment Lines with Line Status is equal to Interfaced, Shipped and Actual Ship Date is less than or equal to Schedule Ship Date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.On Time Shipments

presentationColumns.name: Late Shipments
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of Shipment Lines with Line Status is equal to Interfaced, Shipped and Actual Ship Date is greater than Schedule Ship Date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.Late Shipments

presentationColumns.name: Shipments Past Due
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of Shipment Lines with Line Status is equal to Staged and Schedule Ship Date is less than Current Date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.Shipments Past Due

presentationColumns.name: Shipment Due Today and Next Day
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of Shipment Lines with Line Status is equal to Staged and Schedule Ship Date is equal to Current Date OR (Current Date + 1).
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Picking and Shipping.Shipment Due Today and Next Day

localization.localizationKey: Shipment Due Today and Next Day
